animeDescription: Chou Tokkyuu Hikarian is about a series of bullet trains that are turned into robots. The robots, along with two humans named Tetsuyuki Shinbashi and Minayo Kanda, have to stop an alien invasion.  (Source: Wikipedia)
animeStaff: [['Kanada Yoshinori', ['Episode Director', 'Storyboard', 'Animation Director']], ['Kuroda Yousuke', ['Script']], ['Ooshiro Tsutomu', ['Key Animation']], ['Hayashi Yuzo', ['Music']]]
